title: Mocha Latte
description: Rich chocolate flavor combined with smooth espresso for the perfect morning boost.

title: Caramel Macchiato
description: Velvety espresso layered with caramel syrup and creamy milk.

title: Cold Brew
description: Slow-steeped coffee for a smooth, refreshing taste that keeps you energized.

title: Hazelnut Cappuccino
description: A nutty twist on the classic cappuccino, perfect for coffee lovers.

title: Blueberry Danish
description: Flaky pastry filled with fresh blueberries and a sweet glaze.

title: Chocolate Croissant
description: Buttery croissant with a decadent chocolate center.

title: Cinnamon Roll
description: Soft, warm roll with a sweet cinnamon swirl and icing topping.

title: Almond Tart
description: Crisp tart shell with a rich almond cream filling.

title: Cheese Stick
description: Crispy golden sticks stuffed with gooey cheese.

title: Chicken Wings
description: Juicy wings tossed in your choice of spicy or savory sauce.

title: French Fries
description: Crispy on the outside, soft on the inside, served with ketchup.

title: Onion Rings
description: Crunchy, golden rings with a hint of seasoning for a perfect snack.
